statements: SELECT * FROM email_stats;
SELECT email_id, sent_date, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM email_stats;
SELECT email_id, open_rate, sent_date, click_through_rate FROM email_stats;
SELECT * FROM email_stats ORDER BY open_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_stats WHERE sent_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT email_id, sent_date, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM email_stats;
SELECT * FROM email_stats WHERE open_rate > 0.5 AND click_through_rate < 0.3;
SELECT email_id, sent_date FROM email_stats WHERE sent_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT AVG(open_rate), MAX(click_through_rate) FROM email_stats;
SELECT email_id, DATE_PART('year', sent_date) AS sent_year FROM email_stats ORDER BY sent_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates;
SELECT email_id, open_timestamp, open_duration FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY open_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(open_timestamp) AS open_count FROM email_open_rates GROUP BY user_id HAVING open_count > 5;
SELECT email_id, AVG(open_duration) AS avg_open_duration FROM email_open_rates GROUP BY email_id;
SELECT user_id, email_id, click_id FROM click_through_rates ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT email_id, open_timestamp, open_duration, user_id FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY email_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates WHERE user_id = 100 AND open_duration > 10
SELECT click_id, click_timestamp, click_duration, user_id, email_id FROM click_through_rates ORDER BY click_duration ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT email_id, open_timestamp, open_duration, user_id FROM email_open_rates WHERE user_id = 200
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_duration < 5
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, email_subject FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM EmailInteractions WHERE recipient_id=1;
SELECT recipient_name, email_address FROM EmailRecipients WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, email_subject FROM EmailCampaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmailRecipients WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';

SELECT EmailInteractions.interaction_id, EmailInteractions.interaction_type, EmailRecipients.recipient_name FROM EmailInteractions JOIN EmailRecipients ON EmailInteractions.recipient_id = EmailRecipients.recipient_id WHERE EmailInteractions.interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT recipient_name, email_address FROM email_recipients WHERE list_id = 2 ORDER BY recipient_name DESC;
SELECT list_name, number_of_recipients FROM email_lists WHERE create_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT click_id, click_timestamp FROM email_clicks ORDER BY click_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT list_name, number_of_recipients FROM email_lists ORDER BY number_of_recipients DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, open_rate, click_through_rate FROM email_recipients WHERE open_rate >= 10 AND click_through_rate >= 5;

SELECT e.list_name, e.number_of_recipients, r.email_address FROM email_lists e INNER JOIN email_recipients r ON e.list_id = r.list_id WHERE r.click_through_rate >= 5 ORDER BY e.number_of_recipients DESC;
SELECT * FROM open_rates WHERE open_status = 'Opened';
SELECT email_id, open_date, open_time FROM open_rates ORDER BY open_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM email_contacts WHERE contact_company = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM email_metrics WHERE click_through_rate > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM open_rates WHERE open_status = 'opened' ORDER BY open_date DESC, open_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM email_contacts WHERE contact_company = 'Example Company' ORDER BY contact_name;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT email_id, open_date, open_status FROM open_rates WHERE open_status = 'opened' AND open_date >= '2022-07-01';

SELECT ec.contact_name, ec.contact_email, em.open_rate FROM email_contacts ec INNER JOIN email_metrics em ON ec.contact_id = em.email_id WHERE em.open_rate > 20 ORDER BY em.open_rate DESC, ec.contact_name ASC LIMIT 5;
